articles.description: England will appear in a second consecutive European Championship final on Sunday when they take on Spain.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Gareth Southgate says England reaching final feels 'normal'

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz is one win away from defending his Wimbledon title after clinching a comeback victory over Daniil Medvedev.
articles.title: Wimbledon results 2024: Carlos Alcaraz says Sunday will be 'good day' for Spanish people with Euros final

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a closer look into the footballing journey of Jude Bellingham as England prepare for the Euro 2024 final.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: How a Birmingham City prodigy became England's driving force at Euro 2024

articles.description: Duhan van der Merwe scores his 27th international try as Scotland make it two wins from two on their summer tour.
articles.title: Duhan van der Merwe equals Scotland try-scoring record in win over USA

articles.description: James Anderson says he would like to be remembered as a “decent” bowler after he ends his legendary England career with victory over West Indies.
articles.title: James Anderson on his legacy after England beat West Indies

articles.description: Former England defender Rio Ferdinand explains why Kobbie Mainoo is a special talent before Sunday's Euro 2024 final against Spain.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Why Kobbie Mainoo has 'wow factor' and could be one of greats - Rio Ferdinand

articles.description: There will be another new name etched on the Venus Rosewater Dish on Saturday as Jasmine Paolini faces Barbora Krejcikova in the Wimbledon final.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 women's final: Jasmine Paolini faces Barbora Krejcikova in showpiece

articles.title: England v Republic of Ireland LIVE - Score, live text and radio

articles.description: BBC pundit Chris Sutton makes his prediction for England against Spain in the final of Euro 2024 - and you can make yours too.
articles.title: England to bring it home? Chris Sutton's Euro 2024 final prediction

articles.description: The rugby players, who deny rape, are accused of attacking a woman in a hotel room after an international match.
articles.title: France rugby players charged with raping woman in Argentina
